page.title: 16Biography Crosthwaite 'area'
page.content: {Mr.Ivan Waller}is a well known{rock {climber}who has lived and worked in various parts of the country.He came to live in Crosthwaite because he likes the area and it gives him access to all parts of the Lake District.He has climbed all the mountains in the Lakes and all those in the British Isles over{3000}ft.He has climbed in the company of other famous climbers, notably{Chris Bonnington and Lady {Hunt.}When he was at college he needed exercise so a former housemaster who remembered that as a small boy he had liked climbing trees suggested that he take up rock climbing.He began in 1925 learning from an open book as he tackled the rocks.He retired from work in 1969 but still enjoys climbing.Now he is grateful for someone to carry his heavy equipment.
